channel.title: Trade Bug
channel.description: When I have a player trade each other it works perfectly, but when a player trades a second time and the trade is accepted from both partys if it is your second time trading your client will disconnect, Does anyone have any solutions to this bug? Because I can fix any bug in any server, but as it turns out this is the only one I actualy really need help on, there are no "disconnect = true" in my trade code so if anyone has ever had that problem please PM me or post it thanks.

item.title: Trade Bug
item.dc:creator: @durent durent
item.description:
@durent wrote:

When I have a player trade each other it works perfectly, but when a player trades a second time and the trade is accepted from both partys if it is your second time trading your client will disconnect, Does anyone have any solutions to this bug? Because I can fix any bug in any server, but as it turns out this is the only one I actualy really need help on, there are no “disconnect = true” in my trade code so if anyone has ever had that problem please PM me or post it thanks.
